inscription:
Inscriptions

on left side of bank, inscribed: [THE ONLY MUTUAL / SAVINGS BANK / IN PITTSBURGH / 340 FOURTH AVENUE]; on right side of bank, inscribed: [A SAFE PLACE FOR / YOUR SAVINGS / PITTSBURGH, PA.]; on back side near bottom, inscribed: [ORGANIZED IN 1855]
object_name: The Dollar Savings Bank of Pittsburgh still bank
title: The Dollar Savings Bank of Pittsburgh still bank
